programme.title: Kembara S4 Ep05
programme.desc: Bersama Hos, Shahrul Kamal membawa penonton mengembara dan mencuba pelbagai aktiviti luar di Forest 8 Senses, Tanjung Malim, Perak.

programme.title: Dapur Bujang Western S6 Ep06
programme.desc: Rancangan ini memaparkan Chef Naem yang akan berkongsi menu masakan yang mudah dan enak. Untuk episod kali ini Chef Naem menghasilkan Fish & Chips dan juga Smashed Burger.

programme.title: Celebs Day Off S5 Ep03
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Asmawi, anda juga akan mengenali lebih lanjut kisah kehidupan dan karier tetamu undangan episod kali ini, Sharul Kamal.

programme.title: 1001 Resepi Periuk Nasi S10 Ep08
programme.desc: Danny selaku pengacara dan tukang masak akan menyediakan pelbagai masakan dengan hanya menggunakan Periuk Nasi sebagai alat masakan. Dalam episod ini Danny akan menyediakan Udang Scampi Pasta & Ayam Parmesan.! Tak percaya jom saksikan!

programme.title: Terbaik Dari Jalanan S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Ikuti Suffren dan Banni dalam jelajah mereka menikmati makanan-makanan terbaik dari gerai, warung dan kedai kaki lima. Untuk episod kali ini, mereka akan pergi ke Wakey Breaky, Dhon Burger, Kiosk Dessert dan The Mee Syndicate Cafe.

programme.title: Bakar S16 Ep08
programme.desc: Untuk episode kali ini, Chef Kim akan berkongsi dengan penonton, cara menyediakan Satay Padang & Mini Pavlova.

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong 2
programme.desc: Kham enggan menjual gajahnya Khon kepada peniaga, Suchart Vilawandei yang bercadang untuk menjualnya kepada seseorang yang bekerja untuk gangster LC. Kham kemudiannya mendapati Vilawandei mati di rumahnya di Bangkok, dan dua anak saudaranya, ahli silat Ping-ping dan Sue-sue, menganggap dia bertanggungjawab. Semasa melarikan diri dari mereka, Kham bertemu rakan lamanya Sarjan Mark, yang memberitahu Kham tentang rancangan pengganas untuk mengganggu rundingan damai Kantana di Bangkok.

programme.title: Karantina
programme.desc: 5 pelajar pergi ke lawatan sekolah di Pulau Karantina untuk kelas Sejarah. Tetapi salah seorang daripada mereka akan tersesat ke hospital terbiar dan rakan sekelasnya perlu mencarinya, menghadapi ancaman paranormal di sepanjang jalan.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hariz, seorang novelis terkenal mendapati kekasihnya curang. Andy sahabat baiknya, selamatkan Hariz dengan membawanya ke pekan yang kecil sehingga Amelia muncul di perkampungan tersebut kerana tunangnya dijumpai lemas.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Sebelum Titik Noktah
programme.desc: Hariz, seorang novelis yang sering dibelenggu dengan masalah. Dari kekasihnya yang kini merupakan tunang kepada Amir, dan Bos penerbit bukunya mahu menyaman Hariz. Sehinggakan, rakannya, memberinya peluang untuk memulakan balik hidupnya di rumah terpencil keluarganya. Disitu, Hariz mula dapat merasakan pelbagai kes yang aneh dan misteri terjadi disekelilingnya. Dalam pada masa yang sama, Budi mengawal setiap pergerakan Hariz. Sebelum Titik Noktah membawakan genre thriller, misteri yang diselit dengan penampilan wajah - wajah pelakon iaitu Aiman Hakim Redza, Puteri Balqis, dan Noki K-Clique. Diselubungi dengan misteri sehingga menimbulkan huru hara di sekitar perkelilingan orang - orang yang disayangi Hariz.

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: Sekumpulan rakan mendedahkan objek dunia lain di padang luar bandar yang mereka temui menyimpan rahsia yang lebih besar daripada yang mereka bayangkan.

programme.title: Gemersik Berbisik Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Kimi dan Tasya ke Terengganu buat kajian tentang Lagu Jong Jong Inai. Berkenalan dengan Daniel yang turut ke Terengganu mencari keluarganya.Semasa buat kajian Jong Jong Inai, diganggu oleh hantu Suzana.

programme.title: Gemersik Berbisik Ep 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hantu Suzana menyayikan lagu Jong Jong Inai, menarik mereka ke hutan. Tiba di rangkap sepaktunggulkayu kaki betul-betul tersepak tunggul dan berdarah. Perkara itu berulang setiap malam.

programme.title: Gemersik Berbisik Ep 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Kimi, Tasya dan Daniel terkejut melihat Suzana jadi panel. Lebih terkejut apabila wanita itu memperkenalkan diri sebagai Suhana kembar kepada Suzana.

programme.title: Gemersik Berbisik Ep 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Seorang kanak-kanak mempunyai rahsia misteri belajar tarian Ulek Mayang. Dia dipengaruhi oleh arwah ibu dan kakak-kakaknya yang meninggal dunia di laut.

programme.title: Barajiwa Ep 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Noramina kagum dengan kemahiran bertarung Uzair dan menawar pekerjaan sebagai pengawal peribadinya. Uzair kini mempunyai pekerjaan yang sesuai dan boleh menyewa tempat tinggal sendiri. Hatta mula sedar ada sesuatu yang baik dan istimewa pada Uzair. Uzair mula mesra dengan Noramina.

programme.title: Mat Moto
programme.desc: Filem ini mengikuti perjalanan rakan-rakan "mat moto", juga dikenali sebagai penunggang motosikal, yang berkongsi minat yang sama dalam sukan permotoran. Dalam perjalanan merentasi Malaysia, penunggang motosikal menemui erti persahabatan yang sebenar dan kegembiraan berkongsi hobi yang sama.

programme.title: Awoken
programme.desc: Apabila tiada apa yang boleh dilakukan untuk pesakit Insomnia Fatal Familial di hospital, seorang pelajar perubatan telah menyuruh abangnya dipindahkan ke kemudahan rahsia di ruang bawah tanah untuk rawatan alternatif.

programme.title: The Cave
programme.desc: Selepas sekumpulan ahli biologi menemui rangkaian besar gua yang belum diterokai di Romania dan, mempercayai ia sebagai ekosistem yang tidak terganggu yang telah menghasilkan spesies baharu, mereka mengupah pasukan peneroka gua bawah air terbaik Amerika di dunia. Semasa meneroka lebih dalam ke dalam gua bawah air, gelongsor batu menghalang pintu keluar mereka, dan tidak lama kemudian mereka menemui makhluk karnivor yang lebih besar telah menambahkannya ke rantai makanannya.

programme.title: Nasi Tangas
programme.desc: Hairi dan Fatin adalah seorang kawan rapat. Mereka berdua bersama-sama membangunkan sebuah kafe yang dibuka bersama-sama. Hubungan mereka adalah seperti sepasang kekasih, tetapi Hairi dan Fatin tidak pernah lebih daripada seorang rakan. Mira juga rakan yang baik untuk Fatin. Mira mengakui bahawa dia jatuh cinta dengan Hairi.

programme.title: Superbike
programme.desc: Ia berkisar tentang kehidupan seharian sekumpulan penunggang motosikal superbike yang menggelar kumpulan mereka sebagai 'Pirate Bikers' dan diketuai oleh Bugs (Kamal Adli). Berlumba-lumba di jalanan, kejar-mengejar, berkonvoi dan disaman oleh polis telah menjadi rasa masam dalam kehidupan mereka yang berkongsi minat yang sama.

programme.title: Karantina
programme.desc: 5 pelajar pergi ke lawatan sekolah di Pulau Karantina untuk kelas Sejarah. Tetapi salah seorang daripada mereka akan tersesat ke hospital terbiar dan rakan sekelasnya perlu mencarinya, menghadapi ancaman paranormal di sepanjang jalan.

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong 2
programme.desc: Kham enggan menjual gajahnya Khon kepada peniaga, Suchart Vilawandei yang bercadang untuk menjualnya kepada seseorang yang bekerja untuk gangster LC. Kham kemudiannya mendapati Vilawandei mati di rumahnya di Bangkok, dan dua anak saudaranya, ahli silat Ping-ping dan Sue-sue, menganggap dia bertanggungjawab. Semasa melarikan diri dari mereka, Kham bertemu rakan lamanya Sarjan Mark, yang memberitahu Kham tentang rancangan pengganas untuk mengganggu rundingan damai Kantana di Bangkok.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hariz, seorang novelis terkenal mendapati kekasihnya curang. Andy sahabat baiknya, selamatkan Hariz dengan membawanya ke pekan yang kecil sehingga Amelia muncul di perkampungan tersebut kerana tunangnya dijumpai lemas.

programme.title: Model Family Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga ibu bapa tunggal (Yu Xiang dan Tong Tong) berpindah ke kawasan kejiranan baharu di mana kehidupan semua orang nampak sempurna. Walau bagaimanapun, keadaan mungkin kelihatan cerah di luar, rahsia gelap dan seram menyerbu setiap keluarga dari dalam, dan tidak ada yang benar-benar seperti yang kelihatan.

programme.title: Mat Moto
programme.desc: Filem ini mengikuti perjalanan rakan-rakan "mat moto", juga dikenali sebagai penunggang motosikal, yang berkongsi minat yang sama dalam sukan permotoran. Dalam perjalanan merentasi Malaysia, penunggang motosikal menemui erti persahabatan yang sebenar dan kegembiraan berkongsi hobi yang sama.

programme.title: Rien Pembunuh Berantai
programme.desc: Rein, seorang lelaki muda dengan masa lalu yang kelam, adalah pelaku kepada mangsa yang dicacatkan yang ditemui di dalam beg pakaian. Dia bekerja di sebuah syarikat swasta dan disenangi ramai orang, tetapi masa lalunya yang kelam membuatkan dia trauma. Dia dibuli oleh kawan-kawannya, ibunya mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan lelaki lain, dan gadis yang dia cintai mengkhianati lelaki lain. Suatu hari, Rein dikehendaki polis dan kini menjadi buruan polis.

programme.title: Bohsia Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam
programme.desc: Kisah pesona dua remaja Amy dan Tasha tanpa pendidikan dan latar belakang keluarga sangat sesuai. Amy dan Tasha memilih untuk terjebak dalam dunia perlumbaan haram dengan pengaruh teman lelaki. Mus, teman lelaki Tasha suka bercakap besar dan Acai, teman lelaki Amy mencabar peraturan yang tidak dinyatakan. Ayah Amy, seorang penjudi, sering mengganggu kehidupan Amy. Azam, adalah seorang pemeroleh yang cuba memujuk Amy kembali kepada kehidupan.

programme.title: Minyak Dagu
programme.desc: Minyak Dagu mengisahkan tentang Azman yang berdendam dengan bekas tunangnya Emelda dan disebabkan terlalu dendam dan mengikut pujukan daripada kawannya, Azman telah berjumpa bomoh, Wak Minarjo seorang pawang hebat minyak dagu. Emelda yang memutuskan pertunangan dengan Azman demi mengikut cakap kedua-dua orang tuanya bahawa Johan adalah seorang calon suami yang baik dan boleh menjamin masa depan Emelda, nak dibandingkan Azman yang hanya seorang jurujual yang sering tak ada untungnya.

programme.title: Rumah Pasung
programme.desc: Ryan, Sultan dan Mayang merupakan krew program tv tersebut. Suatu hari Ryan terpaksa menghadiri pengebumian bapa kandungnya. Ibu bapa Ryan membongkar masa lalu Ryan. Ryan anak angkat. Ayah Ryan meninggalkan sebuah rumah untuknya.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Model Family Ep 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga ibu bapa tunggal (Yu Xiang dan Tong Tong) berpindah ke kawasan kejiranan baharu di mana kehidupan semua orang nampak sempurna. Walau bagaimanapun, keadaan mungkin kelihatan cerah di luar, rahsia gelap dan seram menyerbu setiap keluarga dari dalam, dan tidak ada yang benar-benar seperti yang kelihatan.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah Ep 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Amelia simpan rahsia bahawa dia bertengkar dengan Amer di dalam hutan dan dia yang tolak Amer jatuh, dia fikir dia yang sebabkan kematian tunangnya itu. Namun bila Amelia dapat tahu tentang ada kesan seolah diikat leher Amer. Dia pula mengesyaki Hariz, kerana Amelia yakin ada orang lain di hutan itu.

programme.title: The Hollow One
programme.desc: Rachel dan Anna pulang ke rumah dua tahun selepas kematian ibu mereka, dan dapati bandar itu ditinggalkan dengan rumah mereka dalam keadaan kacau dan kotor. Apabila Rachel mula mengalami halusinasi mengenai ibu mereka yang sudah meninggal dan sesuatu artifak purba, petunjuk-petunjuk menakutkan mula terbongkar mengenai masa lalu keluarga mereka.

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Superbike
programme.desc: Ia berkisar tentang kehidupan seharian sekumpulan penunggang motosikal superbike yang menggelar kumpulan mereka sebagai 'Pirate Bikers' dan diketuai oleh Bugs (Kamal Adli). Berlumba-lumba di jalanan, kejar-mengejar, berkonvoi dan disaman oleh polis telah menjadi rasa masam dalam kehidupan mereka yang berkongsi minat yang sama.

programme.title: Galaxy Games
programme.desc: Sekumpulan orang dewasa muda dihantar ke planet yang jauh untuk bersaing dalam permainan Sol Invictus yang berprestij.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel dan Cynthia, pasangan muda dengan anak dalam perjalanan, mengalami masa sukar di Manila. Mereka kembali ke Baguio, tempat asal Daniel, untuk memulakan semula. Melalui kebaikan Alex, kawan Daniel zaman kanak-kanak yang kaya, mereka dapat tinggal di sebuah rumah besar, tanpa sewa; dan dia mendapat tawaran kerja juga. Segala-galanya seolah-olah jatuh pada tempatnya untuk mereka - atau begitulah yang mereka fikirkan - sehingga perkara aneh mula berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong 2
programme.desc: Kham enggan menjual gajahnya Khon kepada peniaga, Suchart Vilawandei yang bercadang untuk menjualnya kepada seseorang yang bekerja untuk gangster LC. Kham kemudiannya mendapati Vilawandei mati di rumahnya di Bangkok, dan dua anak saudaranya, ahli silat Ping-ping dan Sue-sue, menganggap dia bertanggungjawab. Semasa melarikan diri dari mereka, Kham bertemu rakan lamanya Sarjan Mark, yang memberitahu Kham tentang rancangan pengganas untuk mengganggu rundingan damai Kantana di Bangkok.

programme.title: Bohsia Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam
programme.desc: Kisah pesona dua remaja Amy dan Tasha tanpa pendidikan dan latar belakang keluarga sangat sesuai. Amy dan Tasha memilih untuk terjebak dalam dunia perlumbaan haram dengan pengaruh teman lelaki. Mus, teman lelaki Tasha suka bercakap besar dan Acai, teman lelaki Amy mencabar peraturan yang tidak dinyatakan. Ayah Amy, seorang penjudi, sering mengganggu kehidupan Amy. Azam, adalah seorang pemeroleh yang cuba memujuk Amy kembali kepada kehidupan.

programme.title: The Lake
programme.desc: Seorang kanak-kanak membawa balik telur aneh, sehingga menyedari bahawa ia adalah telur raksasa. Ia muncul dari tasik dan membunuh semua orang di seluruh bandar.

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah Ep 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Amelia simpan rahsia bahawa dia bertengkar dengan Amer di dalam hutan dan dia yang tolak Amer jatuh, dia fikir dia yang sebabkan kematian tunangnya itu. Namun bila Amelia dapat tahu tentang ada kesan seolah diikat leher Amer. Dia pula mengesyaki Hariz, kerana Amelia yakin ada orang lain di hutan itu.

programme.title: Plan B Ep 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Episod ke-2 mengisahkan Khai berjaya memujuk Airis menemankannya minum setelah membawanya bersiar-siar melihat suasana Kuala Lumpur dari udara dengan kapal terbang jenis ringan miliknya. Que pula seorang pelajar kolej salah seorang daripada rakan Khai sedang diintip dan diekori polis. Kemudian Airis bersetuju berlumba kereta secara haram dengan Khai, sebagai satu syarat untuk keluar bagi kali kedua bersama-sama minum dengannya. Setelah Khai memenangi perlumbaan kereta iru, Airis seterusnya mencabar Khai supaya melakukan aktiviti yang lebih mencabar, iaitu mencuri kereta, kononnya sematamata sebagai satu hiburan sahaja.

programme.title: Kongsi
programme.desc: Kongsi merupakan sebuah filem aksi komedi mengisahkan penyiasatan ASP Shariff (Fizo Omar) terhadap kes pembunuhan dikalangan kumpulan kongsi gelap di Kuala Lumpur. Kumpulan kongsi gelap yang terdiri dari tiga kaum utama Melayu, Cina dan India ini menjadi huru hara dengan kematian seorang demi seorang ahlinya. Pergaduhan besar hampir berlaku kerana mereka saling tuduh menuduh antara satu sama lain apabila berlaku pembunuhan.

programme.title: Budak Pendamping
programme.desc: Ia mengisahkan tentang seorang budak yang berumur 16 tahun, bernama Firash. Dibesarkan sebagai seorang anak tunggal di sebuah keluarga yang sentiasa sibuk dengan kerjaya, membuatkan Firash lebih senang bersendiriaan. Disebabkan itu keluarganya membuat keputusan untuk hantarnya ke sebuah kem. Disana Firash bertembung dengan Idlan dan rakannya Khai dan Sahar, serta sebahagian dalam Ahli Majlis Tertinggi Asrama (AMTA) bagi kem tersebut. Akibat ketidakpuasan mereka terhadap Firash yang kelihatan lembik, badannya menjadi tempat untuk mereka lepaskan kekerasan. Namun kehadiran budak pendamping mengubah segalanya untuk Firash tetapi ia juga menggugat kesejahteraan yang dah lama tidak bergelora. Lantas, adakah perjanjian antara Firash dan pendampingnya merupakan ilusi semata - mata ataupun terdapat hutang yang akan dituntut antaranya dengan Tuan Daud?

programme.title: Bohsia 2: Jalan Kembali
programme.desc: Tasha adalah seorang gadis yang dibesarkan tanpa keluarga dan pendidikan, memaksanya untuk mencari perlindungan di dunia bawah tanah, di kalangan samseng jalanan. Dia tidak lama kemudian menjadi bosan dengan kehidupannya yang tidak bermakna, tetapi jalannya menuju penebusan adalah jalan yang diturap dengan banyak halangan.

programme.title: Komik
programme.desc: Samad bekerja sebagai pelukis komik di sebuah syarikat. Dia selalu sibuk dengan kerjanya sehingga sering mengabaikan keluarga dan tunangnya. Pada suatu malam, Samad terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya. Apabila tersedar daripada pengsan, Samad bertemu dengan Adika, watak hero dalam komik yang dicipta olehnya. Samad menyedari bahawa dia secara tidak sengaja telah termasuk ke dalam dunia komik ciptaannya itu. Dalam masa yang sama, Adika meminta bantuan daripada Samad untuk menghadapi ancaman daripada Jalak, watak penjahat dalam komik itu. Berjayakah Samad membantu Adika dan seterusnya mencari jalan keluar untuk kembali ke dunia nyata?

programme.title: Main Wayang Episod 12
programme.desc: Program temu bual santai bersama peminat dan penggiat filem tempatan yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi tetamu berkaitan filem Gila-Gila Remaja

programme.title: Nada Siar Episod 12
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang menyajikan kepada anda klip-klip video soundtrack yang terkandung dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan.

programme.title: Ruang Temu Episod 12
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Sofia Jane yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan filem-filem yang diterajuinya.

programme.title: Si Badol
programme.desc: Perjuangan kelas pekerja digambarkan apabila kapitalisme semakin mendapat tempat di dunia. Badol, seorang penipu, menyamar menjadi orang kaya yang datang dari Sarawak lalu mengahwini Milah. Tipu helah digunakannya untuk memperdaya orang kaya. Modus operandinya adalah dengan meminjam wang yang banyak. Badol pun pergi menghilangkan diri setelah berjaya memperdaya orang kaya.

programme.title: Arbaie Bujang Kembali
programme.desc: Semasa isterinya bersalin anak ketiga, Arbaie mengambil kesempatan untuk keluar berfoya-foya dengan rakan-rakannya, Mat Nor dan Ajmain. Arbaie kemudiannya jatuh cinta dengan seorang wanita bernama Nab. Untuk mengelakkan kegiatannya terbongkar, Arbaie mencari helah untuk menghantar isterinya pulang ke kampung. Perbuatan Arbaie itu telah menimbulkan pelbagai masalah kepada dirinya di kemudian hari.

programme.title: Main Wayang Episod 12
programme.desc: Program temu bual santai bersama peminat dan penggiat filem tempatan yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi tetamu berkaitan filem Gila-Gila Remaja

programme.title: Nada Siar Episod 12
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang menyajikan kepada anda klip-klip video soundtrack yang terkandung dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan.

programme.title: Ruang Temu Episod 12
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Sofia Jane yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan filem-filem yang diterajuinya.

programme.title: Hanya Kawan
programme.desc: Hans dan Ella merupakan pasangan kekasih yang masing-masing memasang impian untuk menjadi pelakon dan penyanyi yang berjaya suatu hari nanti. Ella yang ditemui seorang penerbit lagu, Michael Nasir mula mencapai kejayaan terlebih dahulu. Percaya akan kebolehan Ella, dia ditawarkan untuk menyertai syarikat rakamannya. Hubungan antara Hans dan Ella mula menghadapi masalah apabila Ella kelihatan semakin rapat dengan Michael dan makin berjaya manakala Hnas masih mencari-cari arah sebagai seorang pelakon.

programme.title: Siksa
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Aniza sering menyanyi di majlis-majlis perkahwinan di kampung itu. Aniza mempunyai seorang kekasih bernama Jalal yang sering menjadi pasangan duetnya semasa menyanyi. Aniza berasa kecewa setelah dia mengetahui rupa-rupanya Jalal adalah seorang kaki judi. Setelah dipujuk, Aniza bersetuju untuk berkahwin dengan Jalal yang berjanji tidak akan berjudi lagi. Namun, setelah beberapa tahun mereka berkahwin Jalal masih tidak dapat meninggalkan tabiatnya yang gemar berjudi sehingga membuatkan rumah tangganya dengan Aniza retak akibat banyak hutang.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Puteri Megawati, puteri mahkota negara Inderapuri yang mengalami kecederaan dalam satu kemalangan jalanraya telah diselamatkan oleh Hakimi. Semasa meninggalkan tempat kemalangan itu, Hakimi secara tidak sengaja tercicir sebelah kasut yang dipinjam daripada sahabatnya, Kumin. Oleh kerana berasa terhutang budi kepada penyelamatnya, Puteri Megawati meminta pertolongan seorang wartawan untuk mencari Mr Cinderella yang menyelamatkannya dengan ganjaran lumayan.

programme.title: Komik
programme.desc: Samad bekerja sebagai pelukis komik di sebuah syarikat. Dia selalu sibuk dengan kerjanya sehingga sering mengabaikan keluarga dan tunangnya. Pada suatu malam, Samad terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya. Apabila tersedar daripada pengsan, Samad bertemu dengan Adika, watak hero dalam komik yang dicipta olehnya. Samad menyedari bahawa dia secara tidak sengaja telah termasuk ke dalam dunia komik ciptaannya itu. Dalam masa yang sama, Adika meminta bantuan daripada Samad untuk menghadapi ancaman daripada Jalak, watak penjahat dalam komik itu. Berjayakah Samad membantu Adika dan seterusnya mencari jalan keluar untuk kembali ke dunia nyata?

programme.title: Sejati
programme.desc: Bani, seorang lepasan universiti telah tercedera dalam satu perlumbaan motosikal haram. Semasa mendapat rawatan di hospital, doktor mendapati Bani sedang menghidap penyakit kanser paru-paru yang serius. Dia ke Cameron Highlands untuk berehat dan di situ dia bertemu dengan Haryati yang menghidap penyakit leukimia lalu saling jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Cinta Buta
programme.desc: Dr. Razlan, seorang pensyarah buta di Akademi Matahati di mana para pelajarnya terdiri daripada golongan cacat penglihatan. Dengan bantuan Aida, dia berusaha keras membantu golongan ini supaya berjaya di masa hadapan. Abas, tunang kepada Aida kurang senang dengan perihal itu kerana Aida sering bersama Dr. Razlan ketika bekerja. Abas ingin mempercepatkan perkahwinannya dengan Aida namun berlaku sebaliknya apabila Aida semakin tertarik hati dengan Dr. Razlan.

programme.title: Si Badol
programme.desc: Perjuangan kelas pekerja digambarkan apabila kapitalisme semakin mendapat tempat di dunia. Badol, seorang penipu, menyamar menjadi orang kaya yang datang dari Sarawak lalu mengahwini Milah. Tipu helah digunakannya untuk memperdaya orang kaya. Modus operandinya adalah dengan meminjam wang yang banyak. Badol pun pergi menghilangkan diri setelah berjaya memperdaya orang kaya.

programme.title: Alahai Cucu Atuk
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ujang yang tinggal bersama datuk setelah bapanya meninggal dunia. Ujang ingin berkahwin dengan Milah. Namun, dia malas bekerja dan hanya mengharapkan harta datuknya sahaja. Pada suatu hari, datuk Ujang menyatakan bahawa dia akan berkahwin dengan seseorang. Ujang kecewa apabila orang yang ingin dinikahi datuknya itu adalah Milah. Dengan hati yang luka, Ujang ingin membuang sifat malasnya dan menjadi seorang lelaki yang lebih baik.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella 2
programme.desc: Hakimi kini menjadi CEO di syarikat Megapuri Bhd yang dimiliki oleh Puteri Megawati. Oleh sebab tidak dapat membiasakan diri dengan kehidupan barunya, Hakimi bertindak dengan meletakkan jawatan dan perkara ini merisaukan Puteri Megawati. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang wanita bernama Anisah jatuh hati kepada Hakimi. Dia menawarkan pekerjaan kepada Hakimi di syarikatnya dan pelbagai konflik berlaku di antara Hakimi, Puteri Megawati dan Anisah.

programme.title: Mentari

Firash merupakan anak kawan baiknya sendiri. Di saat Mentari dan Firash akan disatukan, ibunya mengingatkan Dato Ikmal bahawa dia tidak boleh walikan Mentari kerana Mentari bukan anak kandungnya.

Bakar panas hati kerana penantian zuriat selama 15 tahun berakhir dengan kejadian tragis. Dia tekad untuk mencari angkara siapa yang mencampak sampah dari tingkat atas rumah flatnya yang mengakibatkan keguguran kandungan isterinya. Pada masa yang sama, jiran mereka Rosnah berasa amat bersalah kerana dia tahu ini semua adalah salahnya.

programme.title: Kau Langit Aku Laut

programme.desc: Mengisahkan Nazmi (Jay Iswazir) yang juga orang kurang upaya (OKU) mempunyai sebuah perniagaan dalam talian dengan bantuan sepupunya, Rafi. Pada suatu hari, Nazmi menghantar pesanan barang kepada seorang pelanggannya bernama Ilya (Ayda), seorang gadis pekak dan bisu. Nazmi tertarik dengan keperibadian Ilya. Dia ingin mengenali gadis itu dengan lebih dekat tetapi Puan Juha (Dato' Sheila Rusly), ibu kepada Ilya dan Inara (Dayana Roza) membantah hubungan mereka.

programme.title: Ehian
programme.desc: Ehian, seorang gadis yang mengembara dari bahagian Timur Laut Thailand untuk bekerja di Bangkok untuk mendapatkan wang bagi membayar hutang ibunya. Kehidupan tidak seperti yang dia harapkan, bekerja keras dan tidak cukup untuk mencari rezeki. Suatu hari, dia bertuah kerana bertemu dengan ketua datuk bandar, Likit dan membantunya pulang ke kampung halamannya. Dia memutuskan untuk menyertai pertandingan ratu cantik tempatan dan menang. Dia menjadi seorang yang terkenal dan membuatkan Loyt mahu menculiknya. Akhirnya Pasin datang menyelamatkannya.

Dia dibawa ke muka pengadilan, berdepan kecaman awam kerana terperangkap dalam cinta tiga segi dan tidak mampu membuat pilihan. Terhimpit antara lelaki yang dicintainya, namun bukan jenis yang setia, dan seorang lagi yang amat mencintainya tetapi melayannya seperti objek, siapakah yang akhirnya akan menjadi pilihannya?

programme.title: Wanthong Ep29
programme.desc: Wan Thong, seorang wanita muda yang cantik dan berani bangkit untuk mempertahankan maruahnya, terjerat dalam hubungan dengan dua lelaki. Dia dibawa ke muka pengadilan, berdepan kecaman awam kerana terperangkap dalam cinta tiga segi dan tidak mampu membuat pilihan. Terhimpit antara lelaki yang dicintainya, namun bukan jenis yang setia, dan seorang lagi yang amat mencintainya tetapi melayannya seperti objek, siapakah yang akhirnya akan menjadi pilihannya?

programme.title: Wanthong Ep30
programme.desc: Wan Thong, seorang wanita muda yang cantik dan berani bangkit untuk mempertahankan maruahnya, terjerat dalam hubungan dengan dua lelaki. Dia dibawa ke muka pengadilan, berdepan kecaman awam kerana terperangkap dalam cinta tiga segi dan tidak mampu membuat pilihan. Terhimpit antara lelaki yang dicintainya, namun bukan jenis yang setia, dan seorang lagi yang amat mencintainya tetapi melayannya seperti objek, siapakah yang akhirnya akan menjadi pilihannya?

programme.title: Merajut Gorontalo Ep11
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang menerokai tradisi masakan Gorontalo yang pelbagai dan unik. Program ini menampilkan hidangan tradisional, cara penyediaan yang asli, dan budaya masakan tempatan di daerah Gorontalo.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep54
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep6
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Di Antara Dua Cinta Ep1
programme.desc: Pada hari ulang tahun perkahwinan Shafira dan Rafael yang ke-2, Shafira dikejutkan dengan berita bahawa Rafael telah terlibat dalam satu kemalangan, dan jasadnya tidak ditemui. Beberapa tahun berlalu, Rafael akhirnya disahkan meninggal dunia. Shafira kemudian membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin semula dengan Julian. Namun, di puncak kebahagiaan perkahwinan mereka, Rafael tiba-tiba muncul kembali.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep55
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep83
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Kalau Sudah Jodoh Pasti Ngebakso Juga
programme.desc: Cerita ini berkisarkan tentang seorang gadis cantik bernama Ana. Diceritakan bahawa Ana ialah penjual bakso yang menggunakan gerobak dan berniaga di depan rumah datuk Rendy. Lama-kelamaan, datuk Rendy menjadi sangat suka kepada Ana. Anehnya, Rendy berasa marah kerana datuknya sering mencari Ana. Oleh sebab ingin tahu, Rendy datang ke gerobak Ana dan melihat cara Ana menyediakan bakso untuk pelanggannya. "Adakah kamu menggunakan ilmu azimat dalam bakso ini?" tanya Rendy dengan nada yang kasar.

programme.title: Mega Series Suara Hati Istri: Anjani Ep9
programme.desc: Anjani berkahwin dengan Ammar melalui perkahwinan yang diatur, namun malangnya Ammar tidak mencintai Anjani, terutamanya selepas mengetahui bahawa Anjani sukar untuk hamil. Akhirnya, Anjani mengambil anak angkat yang ternyata mempunyai rahsia masa lalu dalam kehidupan suaminya.

programme.title: Mereka Yang Pergi Ep3

programme.title: Walau Bukan Jodoh Udah Sambungin Aja
programme.desc: Tari mendapat berita bahawa anak bosnya bekerja di pejabatnya. Tari beranggapan bahawa anak bosnya adalah Langit, bukan Gala, kerana tidak mungkin bosnya akan menyuruh anaknya bekerja sebagai office boy. Namun, beberapa kejadian menyebabkan Tari menjadi rapat dengan Gala, kerana Gala sangat prihatin terhadap Tari.

programme.title: Intimate Concert Ep5
programme.desc: Konsert istimewa para bintang buat yang tersayang. Persembahan cinta yang tulus untuk keluarga, sahabat dan peminat yang menyokongnya. Menyingkap perjalanan hidup dan kerjaya sang bintang. Apakah kejutan yang akan disampaikan? Apakah cerita lain yang akan dikongsikan?

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Countdown (2023)
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: A Man Of Reason
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a man learns that he has a daughter, thus wishes to leave the gangs and live an ordinary life. Yet the new leader of the gangs feels being betrayed...

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Dear Hyeri Ep1
programme.desc: Announcer Joo Eun-ho struggles with dissociation following her sister's disappearance and a difficult breakup. As she tries to navigates her trauma, her alternate identity somehow falls in love with a former military officer.

programme.title: Dear Hyeri Ep2
programme.desc: Announcer Joo Eun-ho struggles with dissociation following her sister's disappearance and a difficult breakup. As she tries to navigates her trauma, her alternate identity somehow falls in love with a former military officer.

programme.title: The Backpacker Chef 2 Ep23
programme.desc: <The Backpacker Chef> is back! With more clients, more demanding environment and an upgraded backpack, how will Chef Paik take on challenges this time?

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Romantic Italy Ep4
programme.desc: Join veteran camper Ra Mi-ran as she leads a trio of rookie campers - Kwak Sun-young, Lee Joo-bin and Lee Se-young - on a romantic camping trip across Italy's hidden gems.

programme.title: The Genius Paik 2 Ep11

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep1819
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Golden Indie Awards 2024 (M) Ep1
programme.desc: The Golden Indie Music Awards is an original music award that celebrates creativity, encouraging diverse and dynamic works from Taiwanese musicians. Established in 2010, it prioritizes Taiwan and originality across various genres, transcending language. Aiming to become Asia's leading indie music award, it recognizes digitally released music and honors genres such as rock, folk, electronic, hip-hop, jazz, R&B, and alternative pop.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep1415
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep173
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Just Eat (M) Ep6
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2267
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep174
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4997
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-retired weather presenter Kwok Ching has always dream of becoming a news anchor. Being a single parent, he interferes in every aspect of his childrens lives, causing them to move away from him. When Kwok Ching receives a doomsday news and finally has the chance to become a news anchor, it is also time to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing has been able to see ghosts since young. When his mothers suicide attempt forces him to return to Hong Kong and the home he ran away from, he discovers that the horrific visions that once haunted him have become worse. Caught between the living and the dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: My Wife is a Gambling Maestro
programme.desc: Natalie Yao Meng stars as the gambling queen, Ying Ying, who is a contender for the Asian God of Gamblers competition. But before the competition she is betrayed by her fianc and left for dead. Rescued by a young man called Gerrard (Nick Cheung) but suffering from amnesia, Ying Ying, must recover in time to compete in the big event!

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynastys Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studios highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Swordsman at Large
programme.desc: Hsiao Shi Yi Lang is the Swordsman at large who everyone wants to kill. A magnificient sword is even created for this purpose though the blade is soon coveted more than the swordsman's death by it! Bandits, beauties and blade masters battle for survival in this exciting story of deceit, betrayal, and death.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clans disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score The Proud One. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clans leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: Young Long Jian Fei, a martial arts novice, is adopted by the Fire Spirit Demon who taught him the powerful Buddha's Palm, turning Long into a martial arts master. Long is tasked by the Fire Spirit Demon to takes revenge for his master, and this soon unleashes a storm upon the martial arts world

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Danger has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Honey Bunny And The Magical Hat Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.desc: Honey, Bunny and their friends must stop Kalia, a criminal mastermind, illegaly selling historical monuments.

programme.title: Hagola Ep13

programme.title: Friends S4 19
programme.desc: Drastic changes occur in Ross' relationship with Emily. Monica and Rachel will do anything to get their old apartment back from the guys.

programme.desc: Monica wears Emily's wedding dress. Chandler forces Joey to get treatment for his snoring at a sleep clinic. Rachel scares Joshua away by impulsively proposing marriage.

programme.title: Friends S4 21
programme.desc: Rachel and the engaged Ross reminisce separately about when they dated each other.

programme.title: Friends S4 22

programme.title: Friends S4 23

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 20

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 21
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip to Canyon Country to bid on huge trailers.A mysterious concrete block and a trailer full of hay mean big opportunities and lead to unusual alliances within the group.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 22
programme.desc: Lori and Brandon get in a fight over a bin and make a wager to see who can do better. Lori eyes a bin with a tanning bed, while a bin with fake walls intrigues Brandon. Meanwhile, Papa Bear and Jesse vie for a bin full of antique furniture.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 23

programme.title: Kung Fu S3 1

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 1
programme.desc: The guys talk ticks, tricks, and antics! What's with Murr's fool proof plans? And Joe's crazy faces? And why is Sal always falling down?! Plus, see the Jokers' best bloopers, and learn all about the guys' annoying habits that aren't captured on camera!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: In this competitive episode Sal, Joe, Q, and Murr battle head-to-head in fierce Joker vs. Joker challenges! The guys go two-on-two as they conduct focus groups where they focus mostly on making things uncomfortable. They pitch fabulous and tasty mascot ideas to diehard baseball fans. Then, Joe and Q, break-it-down old-school-style at the mall. And finally, Sal and Murr face-off in a challenge that literally proves neither is book smart.

programme.title: American Music Awards 50th Anniversary Special Ep1
programme.desc: AMERICAN MUSIC AWARDS 50TH ANNIVERSARY SPECIAL will serve as a tribute to the past 50 years and feature dazzling new performances, heartfelt artist interviews, legendary special guests, and exclusive never-before-seen footage from DCPs extensive archives, highlighting iconic moments that have defined the awards show and shaped pop culture.

programme.desc: In Canada, a tiny turtle ventures through a forest of giants in search of the wetland, and in South Africa, a bushbaby is drawn towards a world of light in his quest to find a home.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep1
programme.desc: Blood on the Ground - Alaskans brave the dangers of the Arctic to prepare for Dark Winters return.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bottlenose Dolphins - It is time for a competitive BioBlitz as the team splits into two to see which can find the most species against the clock.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bull Sharks - Steve wants to introduce the team to the bull shark.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Europe - Robson travels Spain, Portugal and the Canary Islands in search of the highly prized blue marlin. He also eats the poisonous escolar fish.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In Canada, a tiny turtle ventures through a forest of giants in search of the wetland, and in South Africa, a bushbaby is drawn towards a world of light in his quest to find a home.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep1
programme.desc: Blood on the Ground - Alaskans brave the dangers of the Arctic to prepare for Dark Winters return.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep1
programme.desc: British Columbia, Canada - Robson heads out on the Fraser River to find Canada's largest game fish; the mighty sturgeon, which can reach weights of 1000 lbs and lengths of 12ft.

programme.title: Equator From The Air S1 Ep4
programme.desc: South East Asia - In South East Asia, booming economies are taking a toll on the natural world. Gordon discovers how eyes in the sky are helping protect endangered orangutans, elephants and people.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Laos - The Akha People - The Akha people are an indigenous hill tribe who live in villages in the remote mountains of Thailand, Myanmar and Laos. Join Ryan as he treks from village to village, staying with local Akha families.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep3
programme.desc: Oregon - Ben spends time with Pirate Rob, who lives for half the year with his 18-year-old son Damien in a sandbag house on an island in the middle of an industrial river in Oregon.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep1
programme.desc: British Columbia, Canada - Robson heads out on the Fraser River to find Canada's largest game fish; the mighty sturgeon, which can reach weights of 1000 lbs and lengths of 12ft.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 - Mob Rules Ep1
programme.desc: The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Experience the north Atlantics intense, brief summer with its animal residents. Follow Arctic fox cubs learning to hunt for survival, an otter pup going solo for the first time, a mate-seeking puffin, and tiny reindeer taking their first steps.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Welcome to the Tundra Ep1
programme.desc: Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Slammin' Salmon Ep2
programme.desc: Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - So Long and Thanks for All the Fish Ep3
programme.desc: Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. See Big Boi bounce after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom, and cheer as fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon. But who will wear the crown?

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Welcome to the Tundra Ep1

programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.
