programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Kakumbi Are Vulnerable Ep4
programme.desc: Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Into the Darkness Ep3
programme.desc: Stay up late as the northern team attaches an activity tag to a bull shark and finds out what this night owl does after sunset. Then dive 80 meters deep with the southern team, who are hoping to put a satellite tracker on a female great white.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - The Social Network Ep4
programme.desc: Ponder shark community hierarchies as the northern team studies how young blacktips learn social and survival skills. Then rush to Rainbow Beach with the southern team, who are eager to witness the sand tiger sharks most elusive behaviour: mating.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - The Predator's Plight Ep1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Lethal By Design Ep2
programme.desc: Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While its true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - The Hungry Leopard Ep1
programme.desc: A revolutionary thermal camera reveals the secret world of nocturnal predators. Follow along as one of the oldest-known leopards struggles to survive her fearsome neighbors: a pride of scavenging lions.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - A Leopard's Last Stand Ep2
programme.desc: A wise, old leopard reigns over the Luangwa Valley in Zambia. She holds her own against lions, but is about to face her most serious challenge - the arrival of a younger, nomadic female leopard. Witness the bitter battle of experience versus vitality.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Killers Ep1
programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Snares Islands/ Tini Heke Ep1
programme.desc: Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Lion Daycare Ep5
programme.desc: Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World 1 - Summer Cubs Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome spring on the Gomoti River, where cheetah mum Phefo and lion mum Tshaba teach their cubs survival skills and keep them out of the jaws of the big male cats. See lion king Molelo go into battle while leopard Senatia tries to ensure his legacy.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run Ep3
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1

programme.desc: Adventurous Cooking - Mary joins Michael Ball on stage in the West End to teach him some new and exciting recipes - ideal for a keen cook who wants to be a little more adventurous.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep4
programme.desc: Chester and Banbury - In this episode, George attempts to bring the grandeur back to a Georgian town house in Cheshire that's been stripped of its original features, and tackles a 380-year-old Jacobean cottage.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Incredible House Transformations - Kevin McCloud and the experts visit five homes that have undergone incredible transformations, from a Dutch barn and a factory reborn, to a library hidden within a former cowshed.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation S1 Ep4
programme.desc: In Harrow, Emma and Nick help Shaz and Zarqa, who are exhausted by the constant tidying, their inadequate kitchen and the lack of space to relax in their 1930s semi. Can the team turn chaos into calm?

programme.title: Jamie Cooks The Mediterranean S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spain - Jamie is in Spain in the Catalan region. Inspired by the deep taste from the signature Catalan Sofrito, Jamie watches on as his host cooks Scorpion fish soup.

programme.desc: Family in Sardinia - Gino and his family explore the hidden gems of Eastern Sardinia, lunching on a secluded beach before heading into the mountains.

programme.desc: Melaka - In Melaka on Malaysia's South West Coast, Donal braves the Durian Puff! This snack is filled with the world's smelliest fruit which is hugely popular because once you bite into it, the sweet, creamy inside is very moreish.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how to make an amazing pie using chicken thighs and canned mushroom soup; a sumptuous mushroom risotto and a veggie treat, a squash Bhaji burger and flatbread. Miguel Barclay shows us how to make a very low cost Aubergine Parmigiana.

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Royalty Week - Exploring the world of royalty this week, the bakers will be making Pan du Coronne, or Crown Bread, Queen of Sheba Cake, and a sophisticated showstopper fit for a king.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S4 Ep6
programme.desc: The Lanesborough, London - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit The Lanesborough in London. Set discreetly in a historic building on London's Hyde Park Corner, suites are often rented for months at a time and every room comes with 24-hour dedicated butler service.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep27
programme.desc: Sawmetrodon - Ty, Revvit and the crew save a band of Woodland Reptools from an evil and destructive Sawmetradon named Splitter who refuses to join the Trux team.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep28
programme.desc: Speed - Ty can't stop rolling after Skrap-It steals his master cylinder, so the Trux must quickly figure out a fix before he falls off the edge of a cliff

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep4
programme.desc: Crabby / Spe-shell - When Pixies pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallops special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep16
programme.desc: Dew Glue / Dew Believer - When Harpers ceramic dragon is smashed, the Dews must find all the pieces. But when a piece ends up missing, the Dews work together to create a new piece, hoping no one will notice. / Dylan goes to great lengths to invite his Dew Drop to his soccer game but, in the process, learns that sometimes believing in something is more powerful than seeing something.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep32
programme.desc: Stick With Me / Family Feudings - When a romance buds between Tip and Stick, the Boov Out Boys keep getting in the way; When Lucy's sister Linda comes to visit, Oh makes it his mission to make them get along

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep52
programme.desc: Lucky and the New Frontier (Part 2) - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep54
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Summer Outdoor Jubilee - Lucky's competitive side comes out at the Frontier Fillies' Summer Outdoor Jubilee when the PALs meet the BUDs -- a group of talented young rivals.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep55
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Great Legacy Race - The PALs are determined to place first in a race for the coveted Frontier Fillies Legacy Pin. But the BUDs are willing to do anything to win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tinas new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep74
programme.desc: Hate That Baby! - After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda: Dragon Knight Epic Lunar New Year - As our team floats in a boat to England, they are on their last legs. Po tells a story explaining the customs and traditions of Chinese New Year to elevate their spirits.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep28
programme.desc: The English Opening - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep60
programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 1 - Hiccup and the riders are on the run from the Flyers, but when they return to Berk, where Stoick is preparing for war, Hiccup is torn between his desire to get the Edge back and his unwillingness to fire on dragons

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep61
programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 2 - When Stoick decides to take the battle on the Dragon Flyers to the Edge, the Riders must figure out how to trap the Flyers and take back the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep62
programme.desc: No Dragon Left Behind - After being ambushed by aggressive Slitherwing dragons on a new island, the Riders think Stormfly has been poisoned and race to get an antidote

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep52
programme.desc: Lucky and the New Frontier (Part 2) - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep54
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Summer Outdoor Jubilee - Lucky's competitive side comes out at the Frontier Fillies' Summer Outdoor Jubilee when the PALs meet the BUDs -- a group of talented young rivals.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep55
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Great Legacy Race - The PALs are determined to place first in a race for the coveted Frontier Fillies Legacy Pin. But the BUDs are willing to do anything to win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tinas new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep43
programme.desc: Sherman's Tooth / Voyager Gold Record - When Sherman wants to pull his loose tooth for Tooth Fairy cash, Peabody brings a historical dentist on the show. Sherman's fear causes problems.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep42
programme.desc: Postmortem - Tensions run high within team Voltron as they discuss Lotors fate and try to figure out their next move

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep20
programme.desc: Parasites - Mihos has some parasites making him sick, and Cleo and the rest have to shrink down tiny to cure him. This one turns out weirder than youre expecting.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep42
programme.desc: Shell On Wheels/Keep On Truckin - Skidmark competes with rich snail Shellsworth to build a railroad; Turbo and Chet roadtrip with their trucker dad and protect their cargo from bandits.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep42
programme.desc: Picktools - When the crew gets stuck on a sheet of thin ice, they run into a group of Picktools, which appear to be trying to crack the ice around them.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep68
programme.desc: Primrose Loses It - Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fable Forest Gold - The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep5
programme.desc: Car Boot Sale - Big Chris has a clear out and takes all his old junk up to Farmer Green's car boot sale but misses the clutter in Rusty. How will he get everything back?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep6
programme.desc: Hot Stuff - Big Chris takes the cars to the beach to relax in the heat but he is so busy dealing with the cars he forgets to drink his water. But hang on, who else has drunk it

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep2
programme.desc: A Day in Turkey - Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep15
programme.desc: Best Friends Day / The White Whale - Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesnt love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep31
programme.desc: Swords Man - Jealousy overtakes Puss when he suddenly feels like the third wheel after the Goodsword has an instant connection to El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep35
programme.desc: The Battle Of Tianshang Part 2 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep31
programme.desc: Buffalord Soldier - Astrid comes down with the Odin's Revenge flu and the Riders must search for the cure by finding a nearly extinct Buffalord dragon before Viggo does.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep9
programme.desc: The Yarn Fairy / Bake It Til You Make It - When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think they're a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves. / When Marcus and Harper team-up for a school project, they decide to bake something ("It's like inventing, but with food!"), only to come across multiple baking misshaps (and happy accidents) along the way that the Dew Drops must secretly assist them with.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep16
programme.desc: Shark and Pilot Fish / Theo - When shark and pilot fish are separated its up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallops friend Theo finally comes clean on why hes always rushing off.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch cant keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scoochs race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep10
programme.desc: Things That Go Bump / Hide Like a Dew Drop - When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus' house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that it's a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isn't very good at Hide & Seek so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now shes going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep17
programme.desc: Berry Race / The Artist - The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep29
programme.desc: Flynt - Ty gets jealous when a Hydrodon named Flynt becomes everyone's new hero, but when a blazing fire heads towards the ravine, Ty must ask Flynt for help

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep30
programme.desc: Wings - Ton-Ton's dreams come true when the Trux build hang-gliding wings to rescue the Ottos, but when he crashes it's up to Dozer to fly the rescue mission

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep18
programme.desc: Winkly Fest / Snow - When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep17
programme.desc: Tea Times Up / Barks, Baths, and Beyond - When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition theyve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, its up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep33
programme.desc: Cats! The Planet / Selfie-Ish - When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Oh's life in the process

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep34
programme.desc: Newbeings On The Block / Juicy Gossip - When an alien moves into the apartment above them, Oh thinks he's a threat to earth but nobody believes him; Oh befriends the Busy Bodies on Lucy's behalf

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep56
programme.desc: The Healing Tree - While riding back to Miradero, the girls get lost -- and Abigail's horse gets bitten by a snake! Can an old friend's skills help save the day?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep57
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Golden Unicorn - After finding a majestic horse in the wild, Lucky and the girls set out to solve the mystery of where she came from -- and where she truly belongs.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep60
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Herd Is - With academy life on the horizon, the PALs work together to tame wild yearling Governor before they leave. But maybe he's not meant to be broken.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep77
programme.desc: The Unshakeable Bear - Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canadas most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that shes not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep78
programme.desc: Ba-Ba Town - The Templetons hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Babys name.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, hes applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Babys cover at stake, its up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17

It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Ninja Blaze - Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Now Blaze and AJ must use their new ninjas skills to rescue them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1105
programme.desc: Pups Save the Super Cows - Winnie Winnington's cow competitor Mooo-na Lisa and Bettina run away disguised as super heroes during the Super Farm Fair.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1105
programme.desc: Pups Save the Director - Francois is directing a video about Mr. Porter's new line of pies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep121
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments - When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut - Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Poots and Vegetables - Max tries to find something that Sharkdog will eat that isn't fish.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Return of the Nightwalker - Sharkdog and Mia team up in an unlikely pairing to stop Max from sleepwalking right into the ocean!

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Dennis Drones On - Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Dino Cake / Dumplings - Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe. // Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep209
programme.desc: One Last Story, Then Off To Bed! / Lots Of Insects - The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same... // Barbabelle had a restless night because of all the insects!

programme.desc: One Last Story, Then Off To Bed! - The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep720
programme.desc: Valentine's Day Rescue - It's Valentine's Day! But when Zeg, Darington and Starla get lost on their way to the Valentine's Day party, it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue them.

programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep321
programme.desc: Paddington's Earth Day Mission / Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration - It'd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late? // Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep109

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Wonky Wishing Wand / Bip Bip's Big Show - Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. programme.title: LIVE: UFC 309: Jones vs. Miocic
programme.desc: Main Event - UFC returns to the Worlds Most Famous Arena on Saturday, November 17, as Jon Jones defends his heavyweight title against Stipe Miocic in the highly anticipated main event of UFC 309 at Madison Square Garden in New York City. One of the greatest light heavyweights of all-time, Jones is on his way to repeating that success in his new weight class, but to cement that claim, he has to get by the man considered to be the best heavyweight to ever do it in Clevelands Miocic. Plus, a rematch fans have been waiting for comes to fruition in the Big Apple, as former lightweight champion Charles Oliveira faces off with Iron Michael Chandler.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: "Title Unifications" - Champions and interim champions face off to determine who rules the division in four incredible titlecation bouts on this episode of UFC Unleashed. Featuring Conor McGregor, Georges St-Pierre, Max Holloway, and Brock Lesnar.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep401UFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1003MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured the third meeting between flyweight rivals Deiveson Figueiredo and Mexican champion Brandon Moreno. Relive their incredible battle like youve never seen it with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC303PereiravsProchazka2
programme.desc: After defending his belt in style at UFC 300, UFC Light Heavyweight Champion Alex Pereira makes the walk for the second time in as many months as he takes on Ji Prochzka in a main event rematch. And in the co-main, Dan Ige steps in with only a few hours notice to face featherweight phenom Diego Lopes in a catchweight classic. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep401UFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Magny vs. Prates
programme.desc: Prelims - Las Vegas UFC returns to the UFC APEX with an electric welterweight bout between No. 15 ranked contender Neil Magny and rising star Carlos Prates. Magny (29-13, fighting out of Denver, Colo.) looks to deliver another statement win. Competing inside the Octagon for over a decade, the Colorado native has become a staple in the 170-pound division with his victories over former champions Robbie Lawler, Carlos Condit, and Johnny Hendricks. Magny now aims his sights on rising contender Prates with the intention of derailing the prospects momentum.

Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: "Title Unifications" - Champions and interim champions face off to determine who rules the division in four incredible titlecation bouts on this episode of UFC Unleashed. Featuring Conor McGregor, Georges St-Pierre, Max Holloway, and Brock Lesnar.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep707
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Fighter Focus: Christian Leroy Duncan, Day One: Tom Aspinall, Take 5: Paddy Pimblett" - Thursday, July 18th 10am ET / 7am PT Logline: Christian Leroy Duncan details his journey from aspiring professional basketball player to thriving mixed martial artist, under the guidance of UFC veteran Mark Weir. Tom Aspinall recounts his UFC debut in Day One. Paddy Pimblett takes us through his top 5 British UFC fighters of all time.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES - Ridiculous reflexes from Vicario, Onana & Maignan. 10 of the best saves from the 22/23 Serie A season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: UFC returns to Manchester, England with a stacked card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against old rival Belal Muhammad, who brings a10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. In the co-main, Manchester's own Tom Aspinall seeks to retain his interim heavyweight belt vs heavy hitter Curtis Blaydes. All this and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC 309: Jones vs. Miocic
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to the Worlds Most Famous Arena on Saturday, November 17, as Jon Jones defends his heavyweight title against Stipe Miocic in the highly anticipated main event of UFC 309 at Madison Square Garden in New York City. One of the greatest light heavyweights of all-time, Jones is on his way to repeating that success in his new weight class, but to cement that claim, he has to get by the man considered to be the best heavyweight to ever do it in Clevelands Miocic. Plus, a rematch fans have been waiting for comes to fruition in the Big Apple, as former lightweight champion Charles Oliveira faces off with Iron Michael Chandler.
